evidence.snippet: The Arbitration shall take place in Beijing and the decision of the Arbitration Committee shall be final and binding upon both parties; neither party shall seek recourse to a law court...

Where necessary, the Buyers shall be at liberty to eliminate the defect(s) themselves at the Sellers' expenses. If the Sellers fail to answer the Buyers within one weeks... the claim shall be reckoned as having been accepted
INSURANCE: To be covered by the Seller for 110% invoice value against All Risks and War Risk.

The Buyer shall open an irrevocable letter of credit with the bank within 30 days after signing the contract... 80%... will be paid against the documents... The remaining 20%... will be paid against the documents
